P. Oxy. LXVII, 4545-4638. - I. Euripides (4545-4568). - II. Demosthenes (4569-4580). - III. Oracular Texts (4581). - IV. Documentary Texts (4582-4623). - V. Private Letters (4624-4629). - VI. Scholia minora to Homer, Iliad II (4630-4638).

SPOONER, R.D. SULLIVAN, J.D. THOMAS, T. TSIROPOULOU, M. WILLIS, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LXVII (Nos 4545-4638). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 87.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 2001, 8°, xiv-294 pp. et XII pll. coul., dont 8 dépl. ISBN 0-85698-141-9. £65.

P. Oxy. LXVII, 4545-4638. - I. Euripides (4545-4568). - II. Demosthenes (4569-4580). - III. Oracular Texts (4581). - IV. Documentary Texts (4582-4623). - V. Private Letters (4624-4629). - VI. Scholia minora to Homer, Iliad II (4630-4638).
C.R. par Jean Lenaerts, ChrEg 79 (2004) Nos 157-158, pp. 336-342. - Wolfgang Luppe, Gnomon 76 (2004) pp. 100-104. - George M. Parássoglou, Hellenika 52 (2002) pp. 369-371.
